channel.title: Status / Rights
channel.description:
i need some help adding a new 'Status' (Rights) i am using Insidiax Base.
Basically my server has
Donator = 4 Owner = 3 Admin = 2 Mod = 1
I want to know how to add a 5th Set of rights for example.
Site Manager = 5 Sponser = 5
Etc.. Etc..
Thanks for reading, hope you can help.

item.title: Status / Rights
item.dc:creator: @Tutorial Tutorial
item.description:
@Tutorial wrote:

You shouldn’t have to define any ints if you are going to use the playerRights int. Ints are set to be a selected value of somewhere from -2.1B to +2.1B.

Read full topic

item.title: Status / Rights
item.dc:creator: @Dale_x Dale_x
item.description:
@Dale_x wrote:

i didn’t say anything about the status of the right or rank i didn’t even say i was going to make a site manager, im just making examples but thanks anyway

Read full topic

item.title: Status / Rights
item.dc:creator: @wiki wiki
item.description:
@wiki wrote:

Id send you a link on how to add youre own player right’s, but run3 - s3rv3r is down for me.

Read full topic

item.title: Status / Rights
item.dc:creator: @tehjamdude tehjamdude
item.description:
@tehjamdude wrote:

lover854:

Why dont you just make a rank in playersave sitemanager but when doing that you have to add custom crowns in your client and make the site manager load one of the custom crowns

Funny… I agree with lover854…

Why would sitemanager have higher rankings then Owner - just a question

Read full topic
